EmailTemplate.name: ISO Paper Campaign EM-1.White-Space-Paper-EM1
EmailTemplate.subject: Access better paper pricing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I wanted to reach out because I was reviewing your account and I noticed that you haven't bought paper in a while. I think this has to do with being a part of an outdated pricing plan that doesn’t offer you the best pricing on paper.
I’ve come up with two different pricing plans I think you would benefit from. Pricing plan 1 will provide you with better paper pricing at $37.10 for 99115 Grand & Toy paper, along with stronger offers on Grand & Toy brand products. And pricing plan 2 will provide you with better paper pricing at $42.90 on OX9001 Boise paper, along with stronger offers on national brand products.
If you’re interested, you can compare these two plans here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Paper-Campaign.html]]>. If you have any questions please don’t hesitate to reach out to me.
Thanks,
